DESCRIPTION: Purges a certain amount of messages.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}purge [#] @user** ~ deletes x messages from that user
EXTENDED_LINE_5: **{{prefix}}purge [#] bots** ~ deletes x messages from all bots
EXTENDED_LINE_6: **{{prefix}}purge [#] images** ~ deletes x messages with attachments
MISSING_PERM: You do not have permissions to delete messages in this channel.
NEED_MANAGE_MESSAGE: I need manage messages permission on this channel to be able to purge messages.
